summary.span: 表示資料繫結控制項的 XML 資料來源。

span.span: Represents an XML data source to data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [XML 資料來源Sources of XML Data](#source_of_xml_data) - [更新的 XML 資料Updating XML Data](#updating_xml_data) - [指定的 XSL 轉換Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [使用 XPath 運算式進行篩選Filtering using an XPath Expression](#filtering_using_an_xpath_expression) - [快取Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [資料檢視物件Data View Object](#data_view_object) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是逐一呈現資料繫結控制項的 XML 資料的資料來源控制項。The control is a data source control that presents XML data to data-bound controls. 控制項可用的資料繫結控制項中顯示階層式和表格式資料。The control can be used by data-bound controls to display both hierarchical and tabular data. 控制項通常會用來顯示在唯讀案例中的階層式 XML 資料。The control is typically used to display hierarchical XML data in read-only scenarios. 因為控制項延伸類別，它使用階層式資料。Because the control extends the class, it works with hierarchical data. 控制也會實作介面，並搭配表格式清單樣式、 資料或。The control also implements the interface and works with tabular, or list-style, data. > [!NOTE] > 基於安全考量，沒有任何控制項屬性儲存在檢視狀態。For security purposes, none of the control properties are stored in view state. 因為它是在用戶端上的檢視狀態的內容進行解碼技術上可行，儲存的資料結構或其內容的機密資訊可能會讓您暴露資訊洩漏威脅。Since it is technically possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the data structure or its contents could expose you to an information disclosure threat. 請注意，如果您要儲存的資訊，例如屬性在檢視狀態中，您可以啟用加密來保護內容，藉由設定上`@ Page`指示詞。Note that if you need to store information such as property in view state, you can enable encryption to protect the contents by setting on the `@ Page` directive. 頁面上，開發人員使用控制項來顯示 XML 資料使用資料繫結控制項。Page developers use the control to display XML data using data-bound controls. ## XML 資料來源Sources of XML Data 通常會從 XML 檔案，以指定的載入 XML 資料屬性。The typically loads XML data from an XML file, which is specified by the property. 您也可以直接由資料來源控制項在表單中使用字串儲存 XML 資料屬性。XML data can also be stored directly by the data source control in string form using the property. 如果您想要轉換的 XML 資料，顯示資料繫結控制項之前，您可以提供 Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) 樣式表轉換。If you want to transform the XML data before it is displayed by a data-bound control, you can provide an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) style sheet for the transformation. 因為 XML 資料中，您通常載入樣式表檔案中，由屬性，但您也可以儲存它以字串形式直接使用屬性。As with the XML data, you typically load the style sheet from a file, indicated by the property, but you can also store it in string form directly using the property. ## 更新的 XML 資料Updating XML Data 控制項常用的唯讀資料案例的資料繫結控制項的 XML 資料的顯示位置。The control is commonly used in read-only data scenarios where a data-bound control displays XML data. 不過，您也可以使用編輯 XML 資料的控制項。However, you can also use the control to edit XML data. 若要編輯的 XML 資料，請呼叫方法來擷取是 XML 資料的記憶體中表示的物件。To edit the XML data, call the method to retrieve an object that is an in-memory representation of the XML data. 您可以使用所公開的物件模型和它包含或使用 XPath 篩選運算式來操作文件中的資料物件。You can use the object model exposed by the and objects it contains or use an XPath filtering expression to manipulate data in the document. 當您已變更的 XML 資料的記憶體中表示時，您可以將它儲存到磁碟，然後呼叫方法。When you have made changes to the in-memory representation of the XML data, you can save it to disk by calling the method. 若要編輯的功能有些限制控制項：There are some restrictions to the editing capabilities of the control: - XML 資料必須載入從 XML 檔案所指出屬性，不是從 XML 中指定的內嵌屬性。The XML data must be loaded from an XML file that is indicated by the property, not from inline XML specified in the property. - 中可以指定任何 XSLT 轉換或屬性。No XSLT transformation can be specified in the or properties. - 方法不會處理儲存作業並行處理不同的要求。The method does not handle concurrent save operations by different requests. 透過 XML 檔案時，如果要編輯多個使用者，所有的使用者正在使用相同的資料不保證。If more than one user is editing an XML file through the , there is no guarantee that all users are operating with the same data. 此外，也可以針對因為這些相同的並行處理問題而失敗的作業。It is also possible for a operation to fail due to these same concurrency issues. ## 指定的 XSL 轉換Specifying an XSL Transformation 執行 XML 資料的常見作業將它轉從一種 XML 資料集變成另一個。A common operation performed with XML data is transforming it from one XML data set into another. 控制項支援使用 XML 轉換並屬性，指定要傳遞至資料繫結控制項之前，套用至 XML 資料的 XSL 樣式表，而屬性，可讓您動態 XSLT 樣式表引數提供給可供轉換期間的 XSL 樣式表。The control supports XML transformations with the and properties, which specify an XSL style sheet to apply to XML data before it is passed to a data-bound control, and the property, which enables you to supply dynamic XSLT style sheet arguments to be used by an XSL style sheet during the transformation. 如果您指定篩選運算式使用 XPath屬性，它會套用轉換之後。If you specify an XPath filtering expression using the property, it is applied after the transformation takes place. > [!NOTE] > 類別會使用已被取代類別執行 XSL 轉換。The class uses the deprecated class to perform XSL transformations. 如果您想要使用以後所導入的樣式表功能類別已被取代，以手動方式將轉換套用使用類別。If you want to use style sheet features that were introduced after the class was deprecated, apply the transforms manually by using the class. ## 使用 XPath 運算式進行篩選Filtering using an XPath Expression 根據預設，控制項載入所識別的 XML 檔案中的所有 XML 資料屬性或找到的內嵌在屬性，但您可以篩選使用 XPath 運算式的資料。By default, the control loads all the XML data in the XML file identified by the property or found inline in the property, but you can filter the data using an XPath expression. 屬性支援的 XPath 語法篩選器，會套用之後已經載入及轉換 XML 資料。The property supports an XPath-syntax filter that is applied after XML data is loaded and transformed. ## 快取Caching 基於效能目的，啟用快取預設的控制項。For performance purposes, caching is enabled for the control by default. 開啟及讀取伺服器上的 XML 檔案，每次要求頁面，可以減少您的應用程式的效能。Opening and reading an XML file on the server every time a page requested can reduce the performance of your application. 快取可讓您的伺服器，但代價是 Web 伺服器上的記憶體上減少的處理負載在大部分情況下，這會是理想的取捨。Caching lets you reduce the processing load on your server at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases this is a good trade-off. 自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`，和屬性設定為快取會儲存資料，快取失效之前的秒數。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`, and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is invalidated. 您可以使用進一步微調資料來源控制項的快取行為。You can use the to further fine-tune the caching behavior of the data source control. ## 其他功能Additional Features 下表列出支援的其他功能控制項。The following table lists additional features that are supported by the control. |功能Capability|描述Description| |----------------|-----------------| |排序Sorting|不支援控制項。Not supported by the control.| |篩選Filtering|屬性可用來篩選使用適當的 XPath 運算式的 XML 資料。The property can be used to filter the XML data using an appropriate XPath expression.| |分頁Paging|不支援控制項。Not supported by the control.| |UpdatingUpdating|支援的操作直接然後呼叫方法。Supported by manipulating the directly and then calling the method.| |DeletingDeleting|支援的操作直接然後呼叫方法。Supported by manipulating the directly and then calling the method.| |插入Inserting|支援的操作直接然後呼叫方法。Supported by manipulating the directly and then calling the method.| |快取Caching|使用預設的情況下，啟用屬性設定為 0 （無限） 和屬性設定為。Enabled by default, with the property set to 0 (infinite) and the property set to .| ## 資料檢視物件Data View Object 因為控制項支援顯示階層式資料的資料繫結控制項，以及顯示表格式資料控制項、 資料來源控制項支援多種類型的資料來源檢視物件，其基礎的 XML 資料上。Because the control supports data-bound controls that display hierarchical data as well as controls that display tabular data, the data source control supports multiple types of data source view objects on its underlying XML data. 控制項會擷取的單一具名顯示表格式資料的資料繫結控制項搭配使用時的物件。The control retrieves a single named object when used with a data-bound control that displays tabular data. 方法會識別此單一具名檢視。The method identifies this single named view. 顯示階層式資料的資料繫結控制項搭配使用時控制項會擷取任何唯一的階層式路徑傳遞給方法。When used with a data-bound control that displays hierarchical data, the control retrieves an for any unique hierarchical path passed to the method. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` string string ``` ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示從範例 XML 檔的 XML 資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display XML data from the sample XML file. 第二個範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示 XML 資料。The second example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display XML data. 從所識別的 XML 檔案載入 XML 資料屬性。The loads XML data from the XML file identified by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_1/CS/xmlds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_1/VB/xmlds1vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data. 控制項使用 XPath 資料繫結運算式來繫結至資料的項目內的 XML 文件的表示。The control uses an XPath data-binding expression to bind to data items within the XML document that the represents. 如需詳細資訊`XPath`並`XPathSelect`資料繫結語法，請參閱類別。For more information about `XPath` and `XPathSelect` data-binding syntax, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/CS/xmlds14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_14/VB/xmlds14vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` John Smith 1234 Tenth Avenue Bellevue Washington 98001 screwdriver hammer fixture ```

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源控制項快取其所擷取之資料的時間長度 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data it has retrieved.

value.span: 控制項快取資料擷取作業結果的秒數。

span.span: The number of seconds that the control caches the results of a data retrieval operation.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項自動快取資料，則規定如下時：The control automatically caches data when the following applies: - 屬性設定為 `true`。The property is set to `true`. - 屬性設為大於 0，表示快取會儲存資料，快取失效之前的秒數。The property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is invalidated. 對任何變更屬性或包含 XML 資料檔案的內容會導致快取失效。Any change to the property or the contents of the file that contains the XML data causes the cache to be invalidated. 根據預設，屬性設定為 0，表示無限期的快取，和資料來源會快取資料，直到它相依於 XML 檔案變更時。By default, the property is set to 0, which indicates an indefinite cache, and the data source will cache data until the XML file that it depends on is changed. 快取的行為受到持續時間的組合和設定。The behavior of the cache is governed by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果設定為，則控制快取資料的第一個資料擷取作業、 保留在記憶體中所指定的時間長度，並使它失效之後的時間結束為止。If is set to , the control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time specified by , and invalidates it after the time has lapsed. 然後會在下一項作業時重新整理快取。The cache is then refreshed upon the next operation. 如果設為，資料來源控制項快取上第一次的資料擷取作業的資料，但它會保留在每個後續的作業時的快取的時間範圍會重設。If is set to , the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for upon each subsequent operation. 如果沒有任何活動一段時間等於快取只過期自上次擷取的資料。The cache will only expire if there is no activity for a time equal to the since the last data retrieval. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用快取時使用控制項來顯示 XML 檔案中包含的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to enable caching when using the control to display data contained in an XML file. 已啟用快取時屬性設定為`true`而設為資料來源控制項快取資料的秒數。Caching is enabled when the property is set to `true` and the is set to the number of seconds that the data is cached by the data source control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16/CS/xmlds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16/VB/xmlds16vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` ```

summary.span: 取得或設定快取期限原則，當與快取期間組合時，用來描述資料來源控制項所使用之快取的快取行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache expiration policy that is combined with the cache duration to describe the caching behavior of the cache that the data source control uses.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設的快取到期原則設定是 。

span.span: The default cache expiration policy setting is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的行為由多種和設定。The behavior of the cache is governed by a combination of the and settings. 如果設定為，則快取資料的第一個資料擷取作業、 保留在記憶體中所指定的時間長度，並使它失效之後的時間結束為止。If the is set to , the caches data on the first data retrieval operation, holds it in memory for the amount of time specified by , and invalidates it after the time has lapsed. 然後會在下一項作業時重新整理快取。The cache is then refreshed upon the next operation. 如果設為，資料來源控制項快取上第一次的資料擷取作業的資料，但它會保留在每個後續的作業時的快取的時間範圍會重設。If the is set to , the data source control caches data on the first data retrieval operation, but resets the time window that it holds the cache for upon each subsequent operation. 快取逾期，只有當沒有任何活動一段時間等於自上次擷取的資料。The cache will expire only if there is no activity for a time equal to the since the last data retrieval. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用快取時使用控制項來顯示 XML 檔案中包含的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to enable caching when using the control to display data contained in an XML file. 已啟用快取時屬性設定為`true`而設為資料來源控制項快取資料的秒數。Caching is enabled when the property is set to `true` and the is set to the number of seconds that the data is cached by the data source control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16/CS/xmlds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16/VB/xmlds16vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` ```

summary.span: 取得或設定來自檢視狀態之資料來源控制項的快取索引鍵值，或是將快取索引鍵加入檢視狀態中。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the cache key for the data source control from view state, or adds the cache key to view state.

value.span: 快取索引鍵的值；如果快取索引鍵不在檢視狀態中，則為空字串。

span.span: The value of the cache key, or an empty string if the cache key is not in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以手動方式建立的快取索引鍵控制項。The property enables you to manually create a cache key for the control. 這是必要的只有當您要指定包含 XML 或 XSLT 的資料，而不是指定的檔案，其中包含資料控制項的物件。This is required only if you are assigning an object that contains XML or XSLT data to the control instead of specifying a file that contains the data. 當您將資料指派至控制項時，資料是不會用來產生快取索引鍵。When you assign data to the control, the data is not used to generate the cache key. 相反地，您必須手動產生唯一的快取索引鍵如果您打算更新的資料物件。Instead, you must manually generate a unique cache key if you plan to update the data object.

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者定義的索引鍵相依性，這個索引鍵相依性連結至資料來源控制項所建立的所有資料快取物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a user-defined key dependency that is linked to all data cache objects created by the data source control.

summary.span: 索引鍵過期時，所有快取物件都會明確過期。

span.span: All cache objects explicitly expire when the key expires.

value.span: 索引鍵，識別 控制項建立的所有快取物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援的資料快取。The control supports data caching. 快取資料，雖然擷取資料，從快取，而不是從基礎資料檔案。While data is cached, the retrieves data from the cache rather than from the underlying data file. 當快取過期時，它會從基礎檔案擷取資料，並重新快取資料。When the cache expires, it retrieves data from the underlying file and re-caches the data. 您可以設定屬性，以建立所建立的所有快取項目之間的相依性控制項和索引鍵。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries created by the control and the key. 您還可以索引鍵過期，使所有快取項目以程式設計方式失效在任何時間。You can programmatically invalidate all the cache entries at any time by expiring the key. 因為用來建立的屬性，就可以多個控制項可以使用相同的快取，讓他們可以在這裡從相同的 XML 檔案載入相同的資料和轉換檔案並具有相同的案例中並設定。Because of the properties used to create the , it is possible that multiple controls can use the same cache in scenarios where they load the same data from the same XML file and transform file and have the same and set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在宣告式的情況下，屬性會指定為多行的內部屬性的物件。In declarative scenarios, the property is specified as a multiline inner property of the object. 內部屬性適用於 XML 資料，因為它可讓您以任何方式將 XML 資料格式化，並忽略的字元填補的問題，例如填補引號字元。An inner property is compatible with XML data, because it enables you to format the XML data in any way and ignore character padding issues, such as padding quote characters. 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性會優先，並用 XML 檔案中的資料而非 XML 資料中指定屬性。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence and the data in the XML file is used instead of the XML data specified in the property. 如果您變更的值屬性，就會引發事件。If you change the value of the property, the event is raised. 如果已啟用快取，而且您變更的值，快取失效。If caching is enabled and you change the value of , the cache is invalidated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來顯示所包含的內嵌 XML 資料屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to display inline XML data contained by the property with a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項自動快取資料時屬性設定為`true`。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`. 根據預設，屬性設定為 0，表示無限期的快取，和資料來源會快取資料，直到它相依於 XML 檔案變更時。By default, the property is set to 0, which indicates an indefinite cache, and the data source will cache data until the XML file that it depends on is changed. 如果您將設定屬性大於 0 的值，快取會儲存資料，許多秒，然後再擷取新的集。If you set the property to a value greater than 0, the cache stores data for that many seconds before retrieving a fresh set. 如果屬性設定為`true`而屬性設定，快取項目不會自動會失效時變更轉換引數清單中的參數。If the property is set to `true` and the property is set, the cache entries are not automatically invalidated when the parameters change in the transforms argument list. 在此情況下，您必須撰寫程式碼，以確認所設定的快取屬性。In that case, you must write code to invalidate the cache by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用快取時使用控制項來顯示 XML 檔案中包含的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to enable caching when using the control to display data contained in an XML file. 已啟用快取時屬性設定為`true`而設為資料來源控制項快取資料的秒數。Caching is enabled when the property is set to `true` and the is set to the number of seconds that the data is cached by the data source control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16/CS/xmlds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_16/VB/xmlds16vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫方法來擷取相關聯的物件控制項。You can call the method to retrieve a object associated with the control. 如果您指定`viewPath`值，控制項會傳回資料來源檢視物件，代表所識別的節點上的檢視`viewPath`，以及其所有子節點。If you specify `viewPath` value, the control returns a data source view object that represents the view on the node identified by `viewPath`, along with all its child nodes. 如果您設定`viewPath`要，則控制檢查屬性來判斷用來建置資料來源檢視的根節點。If you set `viewPath` to , the control checks the property to determine the root node from which to build the data source view. 如果設定屬性，則控制項將使用它來傳回在相同的資料來源檢視方式`viewPath`運算式的使用方式。If the property is set, the control uses it to return a data source view in the same way the `viewPath` expression is used. 如果未設定屬性，控制項傳回 XML 資料中的所有資料節點的檢視。If the property is not set, the control returns a view of all the data nodes in the XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用直接存取基礎 XML 資料的記憶體中表示的方法。Use the method for direct access to an in-memory representation of the underlying XML data. 您可以操作傳回物件，然後呼叫保存您對所指定的 XML 檔案屬性。You can manipulate the returned object and then call to persist your changes to the XML file specified by the property. 必須符合幾項需求已成功儲存物件。Several requirements must be met before the object can be saved successfully. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The first example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 第二個範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The second example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 資料在記憶體中使用操作方法，每次您選取 節點，並再儲存到 XML 檔案。The data is manipulated in memory using the method every time you select a node, and is then saved to the XML file. 最後，上呼叫控制項來重新整理其顯示的資料。Finally, is called on the control to refresh the data that it displays. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17/CS/xmlds17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17/VB/xmlds17vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 如上述範例中，使用資料操作中使用記憶體擷取方法。As with the previous example, the data is manipulated in memory using the retrieved by the method. 最後，上呼叫控制項來重新整理其顯示的資料。Finally, is called on the control to refresh the data that it displays. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示轉換 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display transformed XML data. 將 XML 轉換會使用所指示的樣式表屬性。The XML transformation is performed using the style sheet indicated by the property. 此外，樣式表會使用傳遞至資料來源控制項中的轉換引數物件在執行階段。Additionally, the style sheet uses transform arguments that are passed to the data source control in an object at runtime. 在程式碼範例示範如何傳遞資料來源控制項所處理的物件事件和自訂事件處理常式，方法的名稱以識別為方法。The code example demonstrates how to pass the object to the data source control by handling the event with a custom event handler, which is identified by name of the method set for the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9/CS/xmlds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9/VB/xmlds9vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` Secrets of Silicon Valley 12.95 Straight Talk About Computers 24.95 ``` 使用下列樣式表時，會將 XML 轉換。The XML transformation is performed using the following style sheet. ``` Price: 15% discount if purchased by: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然控制項通常會用於唯讀資料繫結案例，您可以使用編輯基礎 XML 資料檔中的 XML 資料的控制項。While the control is typically used in read-only data-binding scenarios, you can use the control to edit XML data in the underlying XML data file. 在這些情況下，從 XML 檔案載入 XML 資料控制項。In these scenarios, XML data is loaded from an XML file by the control. 您修改中使用記憶體方法，並再儲存到 XML 資料檔，藉由呼叫方法。You modify the in memory using the method, and then save to the XML data file by calling the method. 符合下列條件時，就能實現此可編輯的 XML 案例：This editable XML scenario is possible when the following conditions are met: - 從所指定的 XML 檔案載入 XML 資料屬性，不是從內嵌 XML 資料中指定屬性。The XML data is loaded from an XML file indicated by the property, not from inline XML data specified in the property. - 中指定任何 XSLT 轉換或屬性。No XSLT transformation is specified in the or properties. 方法不會處理儲存作業並行處理不同的要求。The method does not handle concurrent save operations by different requests. 透過 XML 檔案時，如果要編輯多個使用者控制項，則所有使用者都正在使用相同的資料不保證。If more than one user is editing an XML file through the control, there is no guarantee that all users are operating with the same data. 此外，也可以針對因為這些相同的並行處理問題而失敗的作業。It is also possible for a operation to fail due to these same concurrency issues. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The second code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用用來控制控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 資料在記憶體中使用操作方法，每次您選取 節點，並再儲存到 XML 檔案。The data is manipulated in memory using the method every time you select a node, and is then saved to the XML file. 最後，上呼叫控制項來重新整理其顯示的資料。Finally, is called on the control to refresh the data that it displays. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17/CS/xmlds17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_17/VB/xmlds17vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示和編輯 XML 檔案中所包含的 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display and edit XML data contained in an XML file. 如上述範例中，使用資料操作中使用記憶體物件擷取方法。As with the previous example, the data is manipulated in memory using the object retrieved by the method. 最後，上呼叫控制項來重新整理其顯示的資料。Finally, is called on the control to refresh the data that it displays. summary.span: 取得或設定可延伸樣式表語言 (XSL) 資料的區塊，該資料會定義要在 控制項所管理的 XML 資料上執行的 XSLT 轉換。

span.span: Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) data that defines an XSLT transformation to be performed on the XML data managed by the control.

value.span: 內嵌 XSL 字串，定義 或 屬性中所含資料所要執行的 XML 轉換。

span.span: A string of inline XSL that defines an XML transformation to be performed on the data contained in the or properties.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在宣告式的情況下，屬性會指定為多行的內部屬性的物件。In declarative scenarios, the property is specified as a multiline inner property of the object. 內部屬性適用於 XSL 樣式表的資料，因為它可讓您格式化樣式表以任何方式，並忽略字元填補問題，例如填補引號字元。An inner property is compatible with XSL style sheet data, because it enables you to format the style sheet in any way and ignore character padding issues such as padding quote characters. 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性會優先，並用的 XSL 樣式表檔案 (.xsl) 中的資料而不是在指定的樣式表項目屬性。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence and the data in the XSL style sheet file (.xsl) is used instead of the style sheet elements specified in the property. 如果使用設定 XPath 運算式屬性，它會在轉換 XML 資料之後，套用。If an XPath expression is set using the property, it is applied after the XML data is transformed. 如果您變更的值屬性，就會引發事件。If you change the value of the property, the event is raised. 如果已啟用快取，而且您變更的值，快取失效。If caching is enabled and you change the value of , the cache is invalidated. > [!NOTE] > 類別會使用已被取代類別執行 XSL 轉換。The class uses the deprecated class to perform XSL transformations. 如果您想要使用以後所導入的樣式表功能類別已被取代，以手動方式將轉換套用使用類別。If you want to use style sheet features that were introduced after the class was deprecated, apply the transforms manually by using the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示轉換 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display transformed XML data. 樣式表進行轉換是透過內嵌方式定義資料來源控制項的屬性。The style sheet that performs the transformation is defined inline by the property of the data source control. 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` Todd Rowe 1234 Tenth Avenue Bellevue Washington 98001 screwdriver hammer fixture ```

summary.span: 提供 XSLT 引數的清單，這些引數與 或 屬性所定義的樣式表搭配使用，以執行 XML 資料的轉換。

span.span: Provides a list of XSLT arguments that are used with the style sheet defined by the or properties to perform a transformation on the XML data.

value.span: 物件，包含 控制項載入 XML 資料時，要套用至該 XML 資料的 XSLT 參數和物件。

span.span: An object that contains XSLT parameters and objects to be applied to XML data when it is loaded by the control.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性時就會引發事件，以確保 XSLT 參數可在 XSLT 轉換套用至 XML 資料的時間。Set the property when the event is raised to ensure the XSLT parameters are available at the time that the XSLT transformation is applied to the XML data. 如果屬性設定為`true`而屬性設定，快取項目不會自動會失效時變更轉換引數清單中的參數。If the property is set to `true` and the property is set, the cache entries are not automatically invalidated when the parameters change in the transforms argument list. 在此情況下，您必須撰寫程式碼，以確認所設定的快取屬性。In that case, you must write code to invalidate the cache by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用與控制項來顯示轉換 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an with a control to display transformed XML data. 將 XML 轉換會使用所指示的樣式表屬性。The XML transformation is performed using the style sheet indicated by the property. 此外，樣式表會使用傳遞至資料來源控制項中的轉換引數在執行階段的物件。Additionally, the style sheet uses transform arguments that are passed to the data source control in an object at run time. 在程式碼範例示範如何傳遞至資料來源控制項，藉由處理與自訂事件處理常式的事件。The code example demonstrates how to pass the to the data source control by handling the event with a custom event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9/CS/xmlds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource_9/VB/xmlds9vb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例中的 XML 檔案具有下列資料：The XML file in the code example has the following data: ``` Secrets of Silicon Valley 12.95 Straight Talk About Computers 24.95 ``` XML 資料的轉換會使用下列樣式表。The transformation of the XML data is performed with the following style sheet. ``` Price: 15% discount if purchased by: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關 XPath 資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 表格式控制項繫結至 XmlDataSource 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6bf202f-6454-45fd-9424-e17f6c7eafe8)。For more information on XPath data-binding expressions, see [Binding a Tabular Control to the XmlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6bf202f-6454-45fd-9424-e17f6c7eafe8). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用樣板化控制項控制項來顯示已使用 XPath 運算式篩選的 XML 資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a templated control to display XML data that has been filtered using an XPath expression. 在此範例中，XPath 語法用來篩選的 XML 資料時資料來源控制項的屬性設定，而且也會繫結的項目至 XML 資料的控制項範本。In this example, XPath syntax is used to filter the XML data when the property of the data source control is set, and also binds elements of the control template to the XML data.
